title: TWConfig
description: The schema of the twconfig.json file that contains various build options for ThingWorx TypeScript projects.
markdownDescription: The schema of the twconfig.json file that contains various build options for ThingWorx TypeScript projects.

$schema.description: The schema this JSON file must conform to.
$schema.markdownDescription: The schema this JSON file must conform to.

projectName.description:
The name of the thingworx project to assign to the entities that will be generated.
A value of `"@auto"` will indicate that there are multiple projects present and the transformer should derive the project name from the path.
projectName.markdownDescription:
The name of the thingworx project to assign to the entities that will be generated.
A value of `"@auto"` will indicate that there are multiple projects present and the transformer should derive the project name from the path.

generateProjectEntity.description: If set to `true`, a project entity will be created and included in the extension.
generateProjectEntity.markdownDescription: If set to `true`, a project entity will be created and included in the extension.

generateThingInstances.description:
A flag that, when enabled, will cause the transformer to emit additional collection declarations for any thing template or thing shape with a number of dummy things that implement them.
This makes it possible to use a `THINGNAME` type with that template or shape restriction that doesn't evaluate to `never`.
generateThingInstances.markdownDescription:
A flag that, when enabled, will cause the transformer to emit additional collection declarations for any thing template or thing shape with a number of dummy things that implement them.
This makes it possible to use a `THINGNAME` type with that template or shape restriction that doesn't evaluate to `never`.

includeProjectDependencies.description:
A flag that, when enabled, will cause any dependencies specified in `twconfig.json` to be specified as dependencies on the project entity.
This requires enabling the `generateProjectEntity` flag.
includeProjectDependencies.markdownDescription:
A flag that, when enabled, will cause any dependencies specified in `twconfig.json` to be specified as dependencies on the project entity.
This requires enabling the `generateProjectEntity` flag.

autoGenerateDataShapeOrdinals.description: A flag that, when enabled, will cause the transformer to automatically assign ordinal values to data shape fields when they aren't explicitly provided.
autoGenerateDataShapeOrdinals.markdownDescription: A flag that, when enabled, will cause the transformer to automatically assign ordinal values to data shape fields when they aren't explicitly provided.

methodHelpers.description: Configuration for the generation of method helpers that can be used used within services and subscriptions.
methodHelpers.markdownDescription: Configuration for the generation of method helpers that can be used used within services and subscriptions.

methodName.description: Generates a `METHOD_NAME` constant with the name of the service or subscription.
methodName.markdownDescription: Generates a `METHOD_NAME` constant with the name of the service or subscription.

className.description: Generates a `CLASS_NAME` constant with the name of the class this function is declared in.
className.markdownDescription: Generates a `CLASS_NAME` constant with the name of the class this function is declared in.

filePath.description: Generates a `FILE_PATH` constant with the relative path of the file.
filePath.markdownDescription: Generates a `FILE_PATH` constant with the relative path of the file.

logPrefix.description: Generates a `LOG_PREFIX` constant with the name of the service. Example: `${me.name}::${METHOD_NAME}::
logPrefix.markdownDescription: Generates a `LOG_PREFIX` constant with the name of the service. Example: `${me.name}::${METHOD_NAME}::`

globalFunctions.description: When enabled, global function declarations are permitted and any service that references a global function will gain a copy of it.
globalFunctions.markdownDescription: When enabled, global function declarations are permitted and any service that references a global function will gain a copy of it.

enabled.description: When enabled, inline SQL queries and commands will be allowed and extracted into services.
enabled.markdownDescription: When enabled, inline SQL queries and commands will be allowed and extracted into services.

permissions.description: Controls how permissions will be set up for the services extracted from inline SQL statements.
permissions.markdownDescription: Controls how permissions will be set up for the services extracted from inline SQL statements.

inlineSQL.description: Contains option for how inline SQL statements are handled.
inlineSQL.markdownDescription: Contains option for how inline SQL statements are handled.

permissions.description: Controls how permissions will be set up for the services extracted from superclass calls.
permissions.markdownDescription: Controls how permissions will be set up for the services extracted from superclass calls.

superCalls.description: Contains option for how superclass calls are handled.
superCalls.markdownDescription: Contains option for how superclass calls are handled.

repositoryPath.description: A path to the folder that will be used as a source for repository uploads as part of upload commands. This is relative to each subproject's root in multi-project repositories.
repositoryPath.markdownDescription: A path to the folder that will be used as a source for repository uploads as part of upload commands. This is relative to each subproject's root in multi-project repositories.

copyEntities.description: When enabled, any XML files in the project's src directory will be copied to the build output directory.
copyEntities.markdownDescription: When enabled, any XML files in the project's src directory will be copied to the build output directory.

minimumThingWorxVersion.description: The minimum thingworx version on which the project may be installed.
minimumThingWorxVersion.markdownDescription: The minimum thingworx version on which the project may be installed.

projectDependencies.description: An array of project names that the thingworx project depends on. The declarations of entities included in these projects can be retrieved via the `install` task.
projectDependencies.markdownDescription: An array of project names that the thingworx project depends on. The declarations of entities included in these projects can be retrieved via the `install` task.

entityDependencies.description: An array of project names that the thingworx project depends on. The declarations of entities included in these projects can be retrieved via the `install` task.
entityDependencies.markdownDescription: An array of project names that the thingworx project depends on. The declarations of entities included in these projects can be retrieved via the `install` task.

extensionDependencies.description: An array of extension package names that the thingworx project depends on. The declarations of entities included in these extensions can be retrieved via the `install` task.
extensionDependencies.markdownDescription: An array of extension package names that the thingworx project depends on. The declarations of entities included in these extensions can be retrieved via the `install` task.

experimentalGlobals.description: A flag that, when enabled, will allow the use of global code. Support for this feature is experimental and is likely to break in future versions of thingworx.
experimentalGlobals.markdownDescription: A flag that, when enabled, will allow the use of global code. Support for this feature is experimental and is likely to break in future versions of thingworx.

UIPlugins.description: A dictionary having widget names as keys and the UIPlugins that will process them as values. The UIPlugins must represent the path to a module file or dependency having a default export set to a UIPlugin class.
UIPlugins.markdownDescription: A dictionary having widget names as keys and the UIPlugins that will process them as values. The UIPlugins must represent the path to a module file or dependency having a default export set to a UIPlugin class.
